Class BufferMap.BitField

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    BufferMap

    public class BufferMap.BitField
extends BufferMap.BitsField
    This class is for fields that are a single bit long

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferMap.BitField

        public BufferMap.BitField(java.lang.String name)
        Standard constructor. No size needs to be specified since a BitField is always 1 bit
        Parameters:
        name - - name of the field

    • Method Detail

      • getValueAsBoolean

        public boolean getValueAsBoolean()
        Returns:
        true if the bit is 1, false if 0

      • setValue

        public void setValue(boolean value)
        sets the bit to the corresponding value
        Parameters:
        value - - true = 1, false = 0

      • getValueAsString

        public java.lang.String getValueAsString(boolean printDecimal)
        Overrides:
        getValueAsString in class BufferMap.BitsField
        Parameters:
        printDecimal - - whether decimal should be printed. Decimal will only print if the value is outside of the range 0 - 9
        Returns:
        a formatted string representing the value of this field in hex, binary, and optionally decimal
